mapper.sql: SELECT CMNT_SN as cmntSn , ATCL_SN as atclSn , CMNT_CTS as cmntCts , EMOTICON_NO as emoticonNo , REG_NM as regNm , REG_NO as regNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_ID(A.REG_NO) FROM DUAL) AS regId , REG_DTTM as regDttm , MOD_NO as modNo , MOD_DTTM as modDttm FROM tb_brd_bbs_cmnt A WHERE '1' = '1'
mapper.select:
/* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 게시판 댓글의 전체 목록 */
ORDER BY A.CMNT_SN DESC

/* SQL ID : listPageing 설 명 : 게시판 댓글의 페이징 목록 */
ORDER BY cmntSn
/* SQL ID : selectKey 설 명 : 게시판 댓글의 키 생성 */ SELECT nextval('SQ_BRD_BBS_CMNT') FROM DUAL
